title: Huawei CFO Fights Extradition as Canadian Gets Verdict in China
content:
1. Huawei CFO Fights Extradition as Canadian Gets Verdict in China  Bloomberg
  2. Canadian businessman Michael Spavor sentenced by Chinese court to 11 years in prison for spying  CNN
  3. China: Canadian citizen loses appeal against death penalty  BBC News
  4. Michael Spavor: Canadian businessman jailed for 11 years in China on spying charges  Sky News
  5. Global National: August 10, 2021 | Family still hopeful as Canadian's death sentence upheld in China  Global News

localize.title: ファーウェイCFO、カナダ人が中国で評決を受けたことで引き渡しに抵抗。
华为首席财务官与引渡斗争，加拿大人在中国获得了判决书
